column2: Reach the next unvisited Holy Mountain within 60 seconds to be greatly rewarded.\nObtain a random Curse if you lose.
Become infused with the power of explosions.\nOnly works if you are NOT immune to explosions.
Become infused with the power of electricity.\nOnly works if you are NOT immune to electricity.
Become infused with the power of fire.\nOnly works if you are NOT immune to fire.
Teleport to safety upon reaching critical (but not 0) health.
The wand in your hand gains a strong mana boost.\nIt can no longer be tinkered with.
Kill enemies to rescue fairies!\nNearby fairies empower you.
You can sense nearby unpetted cats.
Opening cursed chests heals you.\nThey also become easier to find.
You are freed from all Curses.\nCursed chests will no longer appear.
The gods have an odd sense of humour...
Gold nuggets gravitate away from you.
Wands have a chance to overheat below half mana.
Wands have frustratingly little sense of rhythm.
Being on the ground too long causes solids to turn into lava.
Gain random bursts of x5 move speed.
Upgrade your held wand each time you enter a new biome.
You survive fatal damage, at the cost of your max health.
A dubious mixture of healthium and some pitch-black liquid...
Increases fire rate when firing starts
Drastically speeds up your entire wand; increases recharge time
Makes your wand slightly more efficient
Pushes your wand to its limits; may cause overheating
Increases a projectile’s damage based on missing mana
A fast and lethal piercing shot
A piercing shot that casts another spell upon collision
Drains organic creatures of their life force
A harmless bolt that casts another spell upon collision
The softer fruit of recursive doom
The softest fruit of the most recursive doom
Raises a wall to separate spaces
Right-click to raise a wall in front of you
Right-click to fully restore your wand's mana
Right-click to toss a smoke bomb
Resets your vertical velocity while firing
Adds 5 curse damage for each Curse you have
Restores 30 mana for each Curse you have
Right-click to cast the next slotted spell(s)
Comes with the responsibility of love and care
Invites a party of fairies to light up the area
Briefly reveals nearby wands and items
Teleports you to where you last jumped
Right-click to teleport to where you last jumped
Stays stable as long as you hold fire
Converts nearby enemy projectiles into health
Right-click to convert nearby enemy projectiles into health
Refunds 90% of all mana drained, but prevents mana from recharging
Lose 25% of your max health.\nTriple your max health if you reach the next Holy Mountain with the balloon still intact.
Gain a Curse.\nYou can freely take this Holy Mountain's other perks.
In future Holy Mountains, you may sacrifice the\nHeart and/or Spell Refresher to upgrade your wands.
All spells in your inventory are converted into random different spells of the same tier.
Can be redeemed for one free perk reroll
Obtain a Curse; replace this perk with another.\nPerks in this Holy Mountain won't disappear when others are picked up.
A helpful little rat may restock a sold spell, faster than the eye can see!
While held, one purchase may be made for free
